content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Sending an email to request a call is a great way to follow up with Sarah and discuss the potential partnership opportunities in more detail. Remember to:

* Keep your email brief and to the point
* Show enthusiasm and interest in exploring a partnership
* Suggest a few specific dates and times for the call
* Be flexible and open to scheduling a call at a time that works for her

By being prepared and professional, you'll be able to have a productive and successful call with Sarah. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

Good luck with your email and call, and I hope it leads to a fruitful partnership!
